attributes.name: panelOffset
attributes.description: The amount of space, in px, between the panel and associated target.

attributes.name: boundaryOffset
attributes.description: The minimum about of space between the panel and the viewport boundary.

attributes.name: metrics
attributes.description: Returns a object containing the metrics of the positionable panel.

attributes.name: targetMetrics
attributes.description: Returns a object containing the metrics of the target element.

attributes.name: windowMetrics
attributes.description: Returns a object containing the metrics of the window.

methods.name: resize
methods.description: Called when the widow resizes, triggering the a display update (see: update).

methods.name: scroll
methods.description: Called when the widow scrolls, triggering the a display update (see: update).
